channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gully great, 26th December
item.description:
Gully grate opposite no 43 , grate is blocked causing water drainage to by pass drain and pond in the road on junction which will cause large area to freeze in cold weather and cause a dangerous hazard on road, needs unblocking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hill Close, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction between Torbay Road and Clarence Road, 26th December
item.description:
The speed hump between Torbay Road and Clarence Road is too steep - my car’s floor constantly scrapes against the speed humps and I often hear other cars scraping against it as well, causing underfloor damage. A similar issue was fixed on the junction between Plympton Avenue and Torbay Road by making the humps less steep (adding a more shallow entry and exit), but this was never rectified for the junction between Clarence Road and Torbay Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Torbay Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 32 Torbay Road, 26th December
item.description:
Leaves and subsequent mud has been left at this location and surrounding street for months, with no adequate sweeping to keep the street in a clean condition.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Torbay Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
